id.label: Module ID
id.description: The unique internal ID for this module. This can only be changed in the source code.

title.label: Display title
title.description: The name by which this module will be presented to the user (e.g., on the home screen).

disabled.label: Disabled
disabled.description: If selected, the module cannot be used by any user

protected.label: Protected
protected.description: Require that users authenticate before being able to access this module.

secure.label: SSL
secure.description: Require that this module only be accessed using an SSL connection. Note: Maintaining a proper SSL site is the responsibility of the site administrator.

search.label: Include in federated search
search.description: Include this module's content in the site-wide federated search accessible from the home screen.

help.label: Help text
help.description: Optional. If this field is empty, the Help button/link will not be shown for this module.
